changes.title: Redesigned notifications
changes.description: Customizing your notification settings is now easier than ever. Quickly change your settings using presets like Focused or Mentions only, or tailor them to fit your needs.

changes.title: Bugs
changes.description: In our continuous effort to make Hirefy the most reliable recruiting platform, we eliminate bugs in the platform! Here's a summary of some of the major fixes:

list.item1: Unable to attach PDF to tasks using the Adobe integration.
list.item2: The total contract time between talent and clients cannot be updated.
list.item3: Some files are not loading when uploaded to portfolio.
list.item4: You cannot update the company photo.
list.item5: You cannot update the job post list from the talent dashboard.
list.item6: The marketplace filters were not working correctly, they duplicated cards.
list.item7: Users could enter a talent's portfolio without having to log in.
list.item8: Homepage: new images with correct shadows.
list.item9: Email Hirefy signatures displayed incorrect padding

changes.title: Redesigned Time Tracking
changes.description: With the revamped Time Tracking interface, you get a streamlined design for easier, efficient time tracking. Track time directly from the menu bar and have admins record time for other users, ensuring total time-tracking control.
